title: All-Star 2022, Nets & Kyrie, MVP Race, WNBA Talk | WHAT’S BURNIN Ft. Jelani McCoy & Josiah Johnson | SHOWTIME BASKETBALL
itunes:title: All-Star 2022, Nets & Kyrie, MVP Race, WNBA Talk | WHAT’S BURNIN Ft. Jelani McCoy & Josiah Johnson | SHOWTIME BASKETBALL
description:
A special edition of WHATS BURNIN is HERE. NBA champ Jelani McCoy and producer/king of twitter Josiah Johnson fill in for Matt and Stak and discuss all things NBA. The guys discuss the newly announced all-star starters, the Nets struggles, the MVP race and are joined by Khristina Williams to talk WNBA offseason. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
